plot: Mona is drowning in her own sorrow, looking for a easy way out. Tired of her life and sufferings Mona is about to get a second chance - just before its too late.
title: Excuses
plot_es: Mona is drowning in her own sorrow, looking for a easy way out. Tired of her life and sufferings Mona is about to get a second chance - just before its too late.
plot_en: Mona is drowning in her own sorrow, looking for a easy way out. Tired of her life and sufferings Mona is about to get a second chance - just before its too late.
